name: Grapple Frog
description:
Controls:

- WASD = Movement

- Space = Jump

- Right Click = Grapple on to walls

Made Using:

- GameMaker Studio 2

- Aseprite

Credit:

- All music and sounds are from freesound.org

- Background music was made by user Migfus20

- Item pickup sound was made by user Scrampunk

Summary:

- My first game jam and didn't get nearly as much done as I wanted to but wanted to at least publish the game to show what I'd done. Enjoy :)
